page.title: 17RECREATION -COLN VALLEY
page.content: In a mainly rural area where many houses are occupied by professional and retired people the leisure activities are very varied. The houses are generally very well kept, and great pride is taken in the appearance of the gardens. Public footpaths and lanes provide opportunities for walking, and riding is a popular pastime. Many people also join in the local fieldsports. One resident is engaged in writing a local history, another restores antique furniture, whilst driving his four-in-hand demands skill for yet another, at the same time providing entertainment and pleasure for others at the Bank Holiday Fete. Dried flower arrangements are expertly made in one cottage while a more exotic pastime is flying a hot air balloon.
